Mixture of 2 normals

```{r}
set.seed(198435)
mus = c(-0.5,1.5)
u = sample(2, 20, replace = TRUE)
y = rnorm(length(u), mean = mus[u])
duy = data.frame(u, y)
group_by(duy, u)[1:6, ]
```

```{r}
group_by(duy, u) %>% summarize(mean(y))
```

y = c(rnorm(n[1], mu[1], sd = sigma[1]), rnorm(n[2], mu[2], sigma[2]))
gm = normalmixEM(y, k = 2, lambda = c(0.5, 0.5),
